TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PolicyAssertionCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Xml.XmlElement>

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the PolicyAssertionCollection class to group together policy assertions and to enumerate or modify a group of assertions.
The PolicyAssertionCollection is used most frequently as a return value for the methods of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> class.

Docs.param: The index at which to insert `item`.
The policy assertion to insert at `index`. The assertion must not be null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Xml.XmlElement> RemoveAll(string localName, string namespaceUri) cil managed

Docs.param: The local name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
Docs.summary: Removes all policy assertions that match the specified name and namespace.
Docs.returns: A collection of all removed policy assertions or an empty collection if no assertions were found that match the specified name and namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SetItem (int index, System.Xml.XmlElement item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, class System.Xml.XmlElement item) cil managed

Docs.param: The index that contains the assertion to replace.
The policy assertion to replace the assertion already at `index`. The assertion must not be null.
Docs.summary: Replaces the policy assertion at a specified index with a specified policy assertion.
